description: A stay-at-home rule will still end on 15 December, but the new curfew will begin - and include New Year's Eve.
title: Covid-19: France moves to night-time curfew from 15 December
title_page: Covid-19: France moves to night-time curfew from 15 December - BBC News
maintext: "We aren't yet at the end of this second wave, and we won't reach the objectives we had set for 15 December," Mr Castex told a news conference. "We can't let down our guard. We have to stay focused, and find our way through the next few weeks with lots of vigilance."
